sentences.english: It's very dark. There's nothing can see on the Li river, but we can hear the beacher clearly.
sentences.chinese: 天还很黑，漓江上什么都看不到，浪声却清晰可闻。

sentences.english: The caves by Lijiang River are well-known all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 漓江沿岸的岩洞也是世界驰名。

sentences.english: Is that the Ljiang River suffused with dim but glittering light?
sentences.chinese: 那远处泛着微光，一闪一闪的是漓江吗？

sentences.english: Lijiang River takes wind flow is the essence of Guilin landscape.
sentences.chinese: 漓江依山流转蜿蜒，是桂林山水的精华。

sentences.english: Iwent for a cruise on the Lijiang River.
I entered for the outdoor sports of school, travel in LI river on sunday.
sentences.chinese: 报名参加了学校组织的活动，周日游漓江。

sentences.english: Guilin is also famous for its meandering Lijiang River and Peach Blossom River.
sentences.chinese: 桂林还以蜿蜒的漓江和桃花江闻名遐迩。

sentences.english: When you are in Guilin, you have to pay Lijiang a visit. It is the essence of Guilin landscape beauty.
sentences.chinese: 来桂林一定要游漓江，因为它是桂林山水风光的精华。
这张照片是中国桂林阳朔漓江岸边的日出。

sentences.english: Elephant Trunk Hill juts out into the Li River where it joins the Peach Blossom River.
sentences.chinese: 象鼻山在漓江与桃花河交汇处突兀地显现出来。

sentences.english: Hundred mile Lijiang River's each view, is a typical Chinese ink and wash painting .
sentences.chinese: 百里漓江的每一处景致，都是一幅典型的中国水墨画。

sentences.english: Mr. Li, what else will we see on our excursion down the Lijiang River?
sentences.chinese: 李先生，我们沿漓江游览还会看到什么？

sentences.english: Gui Hill is used name, It lies eastern part of Gui Lin city , near Li River.
sentences.chinese: 叠彩山旧名桂山，位于桂林市区东北部，滨临漓江。

sentences.english: Yangshuo, down the Li River from Guilin, also offers spectacular scenery.
sentences.chinese: 从桂林漓江的下流的阳朔，也提供了壮观的景色。

sentences.english: Lijiang River in the sights of the change of Qiyou.
sentences.chinese: 漓江之奇尤在山光水色之变。

sentences.english: Therefore, adaption and co-existence is one of culture implications in Li River.
sentences.chinese: 因此，适应和共生是漓江流域的文化底蕴之一。

definition: Elephant Trunk Hill in Guilin, Guangxi
Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
Liujiang county in Liuzhou 柳州[Liu3 zhou1], Guangxi
the Xiangjiang river in Hunan province
Huangguoshu waterfalls, Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
Xihu or West lake (place name)/West Lake in Hangzhou 杭州, Zhejiang/Xihu or Hsihu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]
Fenghuang Ancient Town, in Fenghuang County, Xiangxi Prefecture, Hunan, added to the UNESCO World Heritage Tentative List in 2008 in the Cultural category
Qiandao Lake in Zhejiang, aka Xin'an River Reservoir, created as part of a large hydroelectric project in 1959
